page.title: 17Mexico comes to Brookmans Pk
page.content: Each year at Village Day which is always held in the middle of June there is a display of dancing or costumes based on a special theme. This year-1985-the theme was Carnival and everybody was encouraged to dress up in carnival costume. The three main countries on display were Mexico, Greece and Nepal. Greece was used because we have a number of Greek children in our school and they had costumes and could show us how to do Greek dancing. Nepal was chosen because the village has a friendship link with that country. Mexico was the main country because some of the classes had been doing a large project on Mexico with the help of a Mexican lady and her husband. They taught us songs and dances and we were able to dress up in real Mexican costumes.
